questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子描述古代遺跡被大自然的無情力量緩慢地破壞。選項 A「eroded」意為侵蝕、腐蝕，符合語境。選項 B「restored」意為修復，與語境相反；選項 C「protected」意為保護，與語境相反；選項 D「observed」意為觀察，與語境無關。
questionData.passage: The ancient ruins were slowly being _______ by the relentless forces of nature.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子描述她在完成困難的專案後感受到的情緒。選項 B「relief」意為解脫、寬慰，符合語境。選項 A「frustration」意為沮喪；選項 C「boredom」意為無聊；選項 D「anxiety」意為焦慮。這三者都不適合描述完成困難任務後通常會有的感受。
questionData.passage: She felt a sense of _______ when she finally completed the difficult project.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子描述委員會成員在解決問題上無法達成一致。選項 C「agree」意為同意、達成一致，是常用的片語「agree on a solution」。選項 A「convene」意為召集；選項 B「disperse」意為分散；選項 D「digress」意為離題。這三者都不符合語境。
questionData.passage: The committee members could not _______ on a solution to the problem.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子描述這塊布料儘管看起來精緻，但性質卻是相反的。選項 C「durable」意為耐用的，與「delicate appearance」形成對比，符合語境。選項 A「brittle」意為易碎的；選項 B「fragile」意為脆弱的；選項 D「transparent」意為透明的。前兩者與「delicate appearance」相似，後者與布料的耐用性無關。
questionData.passage: The fabric was surprisingly _______, despite its delicate appearance.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.

questionData.explanation_of_Question: 句子描述離開前確保所有門上鎖是你的責任。選項 C「duty」意為責任、義務，符合語境。選項 A「opinion」意為意見；選項 B「intention」意為意圖；選項 D「preference」意為偏好。這三者都不適合用來描述必須執行的任務。
questionData.passage: It is your _______ to ensure all the doors are locked before you leave.
questionData.question: Choose the best word to complete the sentence.
